testCases.name: Get All Items
testCases.description: Test the GET /menuItems endpoint. Should return a list of all menu items with status 200 OK.

testCases.name: Get Item by ID (Valid ID)
testCases.description: Test the GET /menuItems/{id} endpoint with a valid ID. Should return the menu item with the given ID and status 200 OK.

testCases.name: Get Item by ID (Invalid ID)
testCases.description: Test the GET /menuItems/{id} endpoint with an invalid ID. Should return status 404 Not Found.

testCases.name: Create Item
testCases.description: Test the POST /menuItems endpoint. Should create a new menu item and return the created menu item with status 201 Created.

testCases.name: Delete Item (Valid ID)
testCases.description: Test the DELETE /menuItems/{id} endpoint with a valid ID. Should delete the menu item with the given ID and return status 204 No Content.

testCases.name: Delete Item (Invalid ID)
testCases.description: Test the DELETE /menuItems/{id} endpoint with an invalid ID. Should return status 404 Not Found.
